reuters.title: RESERVE BANK CANCELS WEEKLY N.Z. T-BILL TENDER
reuters.body: The Reserve Bank said it is cancelling its regular weekly treasury bill tender scheduled for tomorrow. The Bank said in a statement forecasts indicate a net cash withdrawal from the system through the week. The Bank expects to be conducting open market operations as usual, and after these operations daily cash balances should fluctuate around 30 mln dlrs. REUTER 
